```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(DBI)
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
dbWriteTable(con, "mtcars", mtcars)
```

```{prql engine.opts=list(dialect="mssql", signature_comment=FALSE)}
from mtcars
filter cyl > 6
select [mpg]
take 3
```

```{prql, connection=con, file="simple.prql"}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
dbDisconnect(con)
```
